summary: Changes how the Deathbrand Armour works, along with heavy variant.
descriptionHtml:
I didn\'t like how Deathbrand armour was only light. I understand WHY it was light, but the enchantments on it were something I really wanted to use, but my light armour skill was low.
Therefore, I created this.

Changes:

+ You can take the original light version to a forge and craft it into it\'s heavy variant (using Stalhrim).
+ You now only need to wear 3 pieces of the set for the full bonuses. (Including the +100 Armour Rating)
+ The fortify one-handed enchantment no longer requires you to be dual wielding.
author: Dehuman
